root.name: Castlevania Legends
root.description: Overview Sonia Belmont, the game's main protagonist Castlevania Legends (known in Japan as Akumajō Dracula: Shikkokutaru Zensōkyoku, translated to Devil's Castle Dracula: Dark Night Prelude) is an action horror platformer developed by KCE Nagoya and published by Konami for the Game Boy in March 11, 1998. Set as a prelude to the Castlevania franchise, the game puts players in 1450 as Sonia Belmont (mother of Trevor Belmont) who sets out to destroy the evil Count Dracula with help from Dracula's deserted son, Alucard. Castlevania Legends is one of the few Castlevania stories to be officially retconned out of the main story. (In which Castlevania: Lament of Innocence is the true prelude to the story)
